channel.title: Comments on: Craggy Ireland goes mobile

item.title: By: Pat
item.dc:creator: Pat
item.description:
Hi Fergus,thanks for the mention! Just to point out,that the app will be free this weekend to mark the 50th anniversary of the Plassey shipwreck which features in the app.
http://www.irishtimes.com/newspaper/ireland/2010/0527/1224271229606.html
Thanks again!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Fergus,thanks for the mention!
Just to point out,that the app will be free this weekend to mark the 50th anniversary of the Plassey shipwreck which features in the app.

http://www.irishtimes.com/newspaper/ireland/2010/0527/1224271229606.html

Thanks again!
